title: from the European Union (Consequential Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 23 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Withdrawal of the United Kingdom
text_norm: 1 order may cited withdrawal united kingdom european union (consequential provisions) act 2020 (part 2) (commencement) order 2020

title: from the European Union (Consequential Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 23 of
heading: 2. The 31st day of December 2020 at 11.00 p.m. is appointed as the day on
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of December 2020 at 11.00 p.m. is appointed as the day on 
which and the time at which Part 2 of the Withdrawal of the United Kingdom 
from the European Union (Consequential Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 23 of 
2020) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 December, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [700] 3

title: from the European Union (Consequential Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 23 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order commences Part 2 of the Withdrawal of the United Kingdom from 
the European Union (Consequential Provisions) Act 2020. Part 2 of this Act 
amends the 1970 Health Act and provides the Minister for Health with order 
making powers to give effect to the healthcare arrangements provided for in the 
Memorandum of Understanding between the Government of the United 
Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland and the Government of Ireland 
concerning Common Travel Area healthcare arrangements. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [700]
